Xingsha Culture and Sports Center station () is a subway station in Changsha County, Hunan, China, operated by the Changsha subway operator Changsha Metro. It entered revenue service on 28 June 2020.
History
The station started the test operation on 30 December 2019. The station opened on 28 June 2020.
Surrounding area
*Changsha County Library
*Changsha County People's Court
